Welcome to this comprehensive guide on geospatial analysis with RStudio! This tutorial is designed to help you get acquainted with RStudio, a powerful open-source tool for spatial data analysis. You'll learn how to work with both vector and raster data, perform essential geospatial operations, and create informative maps.
